main event: A UFO sighting involving a round flashing red light was reported on 14 May 1956.
interesting points: The observation lasted for three minutes,The light was described as the size of a baseball held at arm's length,The sighting indicated a straight flight path,One primary conclusion was that it might have been an aircraft generated sighting,The report suggests the possibility of the sighting being a balloon or an aircraft.
witness description: Civilian report from the Police Department
